text: "Little Lies" is a 1987 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac. It was taken from their 14th studio album Tango in the Night. It went to number 4 in the United States and Ireland, number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Canada, number 10 in the Netherlands, number 16 in Australia, number 3 in Germany and Finland and number 9 in New Zealand. It was covered by Hilary Duff in 2016. ==Track listing and formats== * US 12" vinyl single (Warner Bros.
